name: Page Automator
description:
"Tired to manually add new page one by one when starting new project in Figma?"


Page Automator will help you solve this by automate creating multiple pages in just one click.


• Make your own page automator.

Make your own page automator with providing list of pages. The automator you created will be saved on you computer too!


• Come with many example!

Browse built-in page automator to get you started how this plugin works.
